Trade/Device Name(s): Sejoy Advance Link Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Sejoy Advance Link Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Sejoy Blood Glucose Monitoring System and Sejoy Advance Link Blood Glucose Monitoring System for home self-testing of blood glucose using amperometric technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip for self-testing by individuals with diabetes at home as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
